title: v1.6.3.5-v12 Lifecycle Fixes
details:
Quick Tab lifecycle fixes for container reference loss after minimize/restore cycles:
1. Issue #1: minimize() fallback DOM query using `.quick-tab-window[data-quicktab-id="..."]` selector
2. Issue #2: handleFocus() z-index fallback via _applyZIndexUpdate() and _applyZIndexViaFallback() helpers
3. Issue #3: Comprehensive lifecycle logging at render/minimize/restore completion
4. Issue E: _logIfStateDesync() helper for detecting rendered/container state mismatches
5. Issue A: isFocusOperation flag in _debouncedPersist() for focus-only persist logging
6. Issue B: Sample z-index logging in background.js storage.onChanged handler
7. Issue C: Enhanced transaction fallback clarity with elapsedMs and triggerModule context
8. Issue D: DOM verification invariants logging in _verifyRestoreAndEmit()

Key patterns: CSS.escape() for safe selectors, extracting helpers to reduce complexity.
